decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL1705. Received 25/10/2017. PL1750-LP A. Received 06/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - Outside refuse bins are to be kept at the rear of and not in front of the building unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - Deliveries of produce shall not be made from the property without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Before the use hereby approved begins details of the proposed extraction equipment including noise output and method of odour filtration shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The details, as approved, shall be installed prior to first use and shall thereafter be maintained in accordance with the manufacturer's recommendations and retained as such throughout the duration of the development.
Condition : 6 - The use hereby approved shall only be allowed between the hours of 8am and 10pm daily
Condition : 7 - No amplified or other music shall be played in the premises.
Condition : 8 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times 8am to 10pm Monday to Saturday and 8am to 3pm on Sundays.
description: Change the use of the ground floor from A1 (retail) to A3 (restaurant) including installation of extrct duct.
